description: Technologies we useExpected.NETASP.NETMicrosoft SQL ServerOracleAbout the projectCITY- Hybrid / Katowice - At the beginning of cooperation, a 3-week induction trip to the Netherlands is planned.üöÄ What you'll do:As a .Net Developer, you will be creating applications for machines. with the rest of our team (developers and UI/UX team)Designing and estimating solution approachDesign, code, test and manage various applicationsFollow outlined standards of quality related to code and systemsOur requirementsA team playerAn expert with at least 3 years of experience in programming in .NETA person who‚Äôs eager to share knowledge with othersA person who understands of the industry and its processes, including knowledge of engineering, manufacturing, and assembly processesThe software developer should have a good understanding of .NET technology and its components, such as ASP.NET, ADO.NET, and LINQThe software developer should have experience in object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns to write maintainable and scalable codeThe software developer should have experience in designing and implementing relational database management systems, such as SQL Server or Oracle, and be able to create and maintain database schemasThe software developer should have knowledge of machine control systems, including programmable logic controllers (PLCs), human-machine interfaces (HMls), and industrial networksThe software developer should have knowledge of real-time systems and be able to design software that responds to real-time eventsThe software developer should have experience in software testing and debugging and be able to create unit tests and integration tests for their softwareThe software developer should have knowledge of Agile methodologies, such as Scrum or Kanban, and be able to work in a collaborative team environmentThe software developer should have strong communication skills to collaborate effectively with engineers, technicians, and other stakeholders in the machine building industryThe software developer should have a growth mindset and be willing to learn and adapt to new technologies and industry trends to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the machine building industryFluent command of English with effective business communication skills (at least B2/C1)
